definitions.definition: Land that can be cropped (i.e., land that is arable ); land that is being cropped (i.e., land that is in the cropping phase of a crop rotation , currently being cropped rather than used as pasture or fallow ).

main_definition: Land that can be cropped (i.e., land that is arable ); land that is being cropped (i.e., land that is in the cropping phase of a crop rotation , currently being cropped rather than used as pasture or fallow ).
